recipes.name: Butter Chicken
recipes.shot_discription: A rich, creamy North Indian curry with tender chicken pieces in a buttery tomato sauce, finished with cream and aromatic spices.
steps: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt.
Cook in butter, add tomato puree and simmer.
Add cream and simmer until done.

recipes.name: Masala Dosa
recipes.shot_discription: A crispy South Indian rice crepe stuffed with a flavorful spiced potato filling, served hot with coconut chutney and tangy sambar.
steps: Prepare the potato masala with spices.
Spread dosa batter on hot pan.
Place masala filling, fold and serve with chutney.

recipes.name: Paneer Butter Masala
recipes.shot_discription: Soft paneer cubes cooked in a smooth, buttery tomato gravy, enriched with cream and gently spiced for a mild, comforting flavor.
steps: Cook tomato puree with spices in butter.
Add cream and paneer, simmer until blended.

recipes.name: Hyderabadi Biryani
recipes.shot_discription: A fragrant rice dish layered with marinated chicken, fried onions, and saffron, cooked on low heat for perfect dum-style biryani.
steps: Layer rice and marinated chicken in a pot.
Add fried onions, saffron milk, and seal the pot.
Cook on low heat for 45 mins (dum style).
